remarks: If there is a sequence of radii approaching zero for which the balls of both metrics coincide, then the generated topologies are equivalent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
statement:

metequiv.4 $e |- K = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
metequiv2 $p |- ( ( C e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> ( A. x e. X A. r e. RR+ E. s e. RR+ ( s <_ r /\ ( x ( ball ` C ) s ) = ( x ( ball ` D ) s ) ) -> J = K ) ) $.
